crypto-rsa.title: Crypto RSA
crypto-rsa.description: A complete project, which works with advanced concepts from design to RSA cryptography.
crypto-rsa.emphasized-sentence: Crypto RSA is a fast and optimized cryptography platform prioritizing the security of the custom RSA algorithm.

content.data: Because it is an application whose focus was precisely to be very simple and easy to use, we chose to implement only 3 pages, where all pages access all pages.
To be objective, there will be only 3 endpoints implemented in the REST API, and each one will be served by one of the pages.

A web platform capable of encrypting and decrypting the contents of a txt file, whose RSA encryption is customized, that is, without using an external library. It must deliver an interface that has a simple approach and is attractive.

data.text: The sender must insert a TXT file with the message
The recipient must insert the encrypted TXT file
The sender must inform the public RSA key
The recipient must inform the private RSA key
The sender will receive the encrypted TXT file
The recipient will receive the decrypted TXT file

gshop-integration.title: Integration VTEX with GShop
gshop-integration.description: Plan and implement a solution to capture SKUs from the VTEX catalog every day and integrate with Google Shopping.
gshop-integration.warning: Since this is an implementation for a private company, there will be no code exposure or explanation of business rules.
gshop-integration.emphasized-sentence: Responsible for saving a lot of money, this script delivers results that maximize the company's profit.

content.data: In this simple structural diagram, we can directly see the main entities of the solution. We can see 2 backend servers (Service and Crawler), VTEX as an external client and Radis & Postgres as Data Storage/Cache Management.

data.alt: Diagram of Integration Google Shopping project

content.data:
This diagram illustrates the proposed architecture for the solution. Although some components are already implemented, others are in the planning phase and are expected to be implemented in the future.

Initially, the flow will be orchestrated by an initialization script. In its current version, this script communicates directly with the server to obtain the necessary initial data. However, a queue will then be used to efficiently process a large volume of requests that will be made.

These requests will be directed to a load balancer, responsible for distributing incoming traffic among the servers, optimizing processing. Each server, which shares the same implementation, will have the main responsibilities of establishing communication with external systems (VTEX), accessing the database, and recording logs and monitoring metrics for each execution.

data.alt: Diagram of Integration Google Shopping project

content.data:
The sequence diagram below refers to the first part of the flow, in the communication between the two backends, that is, the service and the crawler. Here, the search for products and whitelabel sellers that exist in VTEX is performed. The sellers are saved in the database and the products are returned in the API.

After performing this initial search, the queue is used. This initial return brings with it the list of product IDs divided into groups, that is, a string array. And each group of this (string array) is added to the MGT_PRODUCTS queue.

Below is the sequence diagram for processing the MGT_PRODUCT queue. We can see that there is a loop right at the beginning, in the received argument, in order to, for each product, search for its details (more information) and add a job to another queue, called XML_PRODUCT.

We can also see that, after finishing the loop, there is an addition of u. job in the MGT_AVAILABILITIES queue.

In the queue, whose name is MGT_AVAILABILITIES, there is an implementation that searches for the availability of the products received. Remember: here an array of products is received, and the availability is checked here, using the VTEX simulation API.

After searching for the availability of all products, a loop is performed through this list of availabilities in order to add a job for each availability in another queue, called XML_AVAILABILITY.

And finally, the last two queues to be described. One (the one on the left) is the XML_PRODUCT queue, the other (on the right) is the XML_AVAILABILITY queue. Both have a very similar function: to receive content and write it to an XML file, with the first receiving the product information, and the second receiving the availability of a product.

redesign-rave.title: Redesign Rave
redesign-rave.description: Redesign of a watch party app, to watch content from different platforms, such as Netflix, YouTube and Drive.
redesign-rave.emphasized-sentence: Rave's redesign elevates the virtual experience, creating memories and transforming longing into connection.

content.data: Thinking about not only updating the screen but also adding new features that would add value, the following modules were designed: Home, Profile, Direct Messages, Notifications, Server List, Creating a New Server and, most importantly, the Server Room.

We have designed some features, some of which already exist in the app, but with poor usability, and others that are not actually available within the app. All of them aim to improve interactivity between users and the user experience as a whole.

data.text: More objective and simple video and server configuration
Viewing information about the server and the content being transmitted
Possibility of exchanging direct messages with users
Addition of access log showing the date, time and device

personal-facts.title: Some personal facts about me
personal-facts.text:
I’ve been married for a year to an extraordinary woman — a faithful companion and the future mother of our children. She is my top priority, God’s greatest gift in my life, and an essential part of my journey. We share faith, values, and the desire to build a strong family.

I’m a Protestant Christian and strive to live a life aligned with biblical principles. I identify with the Baptist doctrine, as I believe it to be a faithful interpretation of the Scriptures. My faith guides my decisions and serves as the foundation upon which I build my life.

I’m passionate about cars and have always been fascinated by the automotive world. I appreciate the design, engineering, and history behind each vehicle. While I don’t have deep technical knowledge, I truly admire the innovation and evolution within the industry.

RAP music has a strong influence on me, especially for its raw, honest, and socially conscious messages. I closely follow freestyle battles, particularly in the Brazilian scene. I value the creativity, technique, and powerful expression that this art form demands.
